title: Album Network Broadcast - In The Studio - Stevie Ray Vaughan
description:
Tha Album Network produces a syndicated radio show which is distributed to subscriber rock radio stations all over the U.S.

The show is hosted by popular air personality Redbeard.

Original air date for this broadcast was June of 1993. The tracks included are uncut, and even include the national advertising spots that were to air at that time. I actually ran these discs in the studio, aired them myself, and found the show quite enjoyable. When I left the station, I asked if I may have the discs for myself, which they obliged. Hopefully you will find them enjoyable too. 

This posthumous production featuring Stevie Ray Vaughan includes interviews from Tommy Shannon, Chris Layton, Buddy Guy, and others. A nice addition to any SRV fan\\\&#039;s collection. I\\\&#039;ve searched, and I would assume this is the only copy of this floating around.

recorded in 192kbps total running time about 123 minutes 12 files total.

Be gentle, it\\\&#039;s my first torrent.
